page.title: 12Living in Esholt
page.content: Most of the people we talked to were elderly,perhaps because we went during the day,but the impression we formed was that Esholt tends to be a place where elderly people live. A lot of them seem more interested in the past than in the present. When we asked them why they lived in Esholt,most people said they liked the peace and tranquility,and they liked being surrounded by farms and countryside. They especially like the beautiful scenery,even though this brings the tourists,and the tourists do bring problems.On Wednesdays and Sundays the village is packed with them,and they do leave a lot of litter behind. Perhaps Esholt people have the best of all worlds. They live in beautiful surroundings, but they are close to two major cities.The price they have to pay are the tourists and the smell
